_memref_data_t Struct Reference

Detailed Description

A trace entry representing a data load, store, or prefetch.

Field Documentation

◆ addr

addr_t _memref_data_t::addr

Address of data being loaded or stored.

◆ pc

addr_t _memref_data_t::pc

Program counter of instruction performing load or store.

Process id.

◆ size

Size of data being loaded or stored.

◆ tid

memref_tid_t _memref_data_t::tid

Thread id.

◆ type

trace_type_t _memref_data_t::type

TRACE_TYPE_READ, TRACE_TYPE_WRITE, or type_is_prefetch().
